agenda.title: Blueprint Delivered: Reimagining Software Creation
agenda.description: Session that introduces the new Blueprint Delivered model and discuss why this change is needed. First establishing Blueprint's fundamental role in bridging business vision and technical execution, then describing the model and an overview of the different journeys (the four key use cases where Blueprint adds measurable value)
agenda.speaker: Scott Merrit & Dion Lammers

agenda.title: Blueprint to Value: Unified Delivery Excellence
agenda.description: The complete journey from blueprinting through value activation, emphasizes the collaborative nature of the delivery method, and positions the session as the culmination of excellence across all roles.
agenda.speaker: Scott Merrit & Dion Lammers

agenda.title: Move to evening event
agenda.description: 19 min walk or 10 min by metro

agenda.title: Luggage storage & Check out
agenda.description: If no space is available, you may bring your belongings into the breakout rooms.

agenda.title: Opening and Welcome Session, Business Review and Outlook
agenda.description: Business Review and Outlook for the end of the year, Strategy for next year, Industries, products, trends. What's the impact for the team, for me as individual? What do we expect from the team to support the strategy?
agenda.speaker: RDs

agenda.title: Awards!
agenda.description: Live Poll (slido) awards. Hand-over awards to the individuals, Teams. Photo of winners
agenda.speaker: RDs

agenda.title: Q&A
agenda.description: Q&A
agenda.speaker: RDs

agenda.title: Closing
agenda.description: All regions together in the plenary room
agenda.speaker: Walter Koehler

agenda.title: Departure
agenda.description: We kindly ask that you take the metro or share an Uber to reach the airport

agenda.title: Go to market
agenda.description: Discuss offerings and sales process with BPD

agenda.description: Walkthrough of readiness stage and project plan
agenda.speaker: Scott Holz

agenda.title: Delivery readiness
agenda.description: Readiness - interactive session
agenda.speaker: Scott Merritt

agenda.speaker: Scott Holz

agenda.title: Barriers revisited
agenda.description: Based on learnings; what remains and what is solved

agenda.description: Opening with Welcome, Overview of Key Topics, Setting Goals
agenda.speaker: Thorsten Hagenberger

agenda.title: Feedback and Learnings
agenda.description: Slido Session and Discussion, Quiz. Feedback of the first 2 days. Personal learnings
agenda.speaker: Thorsten Hagenberger

agenda.title: Best Practice Session
agenda.description: Real Live Examples of strategic relevant opps, projects, presented by CSEs or PDLs. Testdrives, Blueprint Delivered, innovative delivery approach (50% reduction of time) Partner play, Fixed Price, etc, Learnings
